title: Game freezing and being kicked from game, resulting in punishment.
body:
I hae been randomly freezing, when this happens I need to restart my computer in order to rejoin. This is frustrating especially when my team is winning or has a chance for the comeback. On top of this I hae recently begun being punished for my "offences". Just hoping that this can be looked into, it usually only happens once eery 50 or so games but recently it happened 2 or 3 times in a day and I was warned then put into a lower priority queue... I beliee I hae found the issue and rectified it (Seems a background program may affect the way my league runs)  but I just don't see lagging out as something I should be punished for. 

Hopefully I get a response.  

Thanks Riot. And happy leagues.

replies.body: would it be cool to post a list of known issues? that would be good info for the community

It's actually more difficult than it seems due to the nature of troubleshooting with tech issues :(  For example, one player might be running LoLRecorder that consistently crashes the game and is resolved by disabling it; yet 10 other players run it without issue perfectly fine.  Each computer configuration is different, which can cause certain programs to be an issue, and others will be fine.

Additionally, we consistently put up sticky threads when we notice a widespread issue that many players are experiencing with common steps to  resolve it.  We do sometimes miss some things as well, which is why we spend a fair amount of time in Help and Support reading through threads.

As for other gameplay bugs, it may be a good idea to create an expansive list of all issues we know about and are working on resolving.  This is something we will consider in the future!

There's already a list of common issues in [the Wrenchmen's Toolbox](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/peVhMJAo-the-wrenchmens-toolbox-common-solutions-to-your-problems-technical-issues) on the front page.

Thanks a lot for the response, and no issues as of yet. So long as things keep up I doubt you'll see any more posts like this in the future from me.

Thanks again.

I've been having the same problems and played the 5 games for the queue to go away and yet I still have it and have to wait 10 minutes for every game I want to play and its been annoying and yet I sometimes get like 10 or 15 minute random queues which normally are 2 minutes and I cant seem to find a problem nothing is running in my background and it just freezes and then I rejoin and the next thing you know, I get hit with a 5 game penalty but it just doesn't seem to let me queue for the past 10 or so games without the penalty timer
